title: Why do people cry for small reasons and how do they get over it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Crying on small small things doesn't mean you are very emotional or sensitive type of person. Sometime it shows your weakness . People who are good in hiding there emotion's are introvert and they are also emotional kind of people's. Sometimes there is a need to control your emotions , in front of your children, in front of your wife ,in front of your mother. When someone didn't cry from a long time then it burst out automaticalit depends upon situation either you go for it or hide. Yaa sometimes it good to cry u you can do it in a bathroom or when no one is at home. You feel relax. I also did it on a few occasions. I also have a habit of being naked in a room and moving and screaming alone. It really feels good.

People cry for small reasons because we have no/very less control over our feelings. People fall in love easily, people get heart broken easily, people get sad or annoyed easily. This things make people unstable as their feelings cant be controlled. Crying is also something of same sort. But crying isn’t any sin, right? Crying makes you stronger, it makes you immune for that particular thing you cried for and if it happens again, believe me you won’t cry this time!
